level.heading: Nonexclusive.
level.text: This subchapter shall not be exclusive. Partnerships may merge or engage in interest exchanges in any other manner provided or permitted by law.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 909 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act).
